price: ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߞߊߣߊ߬ ߝߏߦߌ߫ ߓߊ߬ߕߏ߫ ߘߋ߬ ߝߏ߫ ߊߟߊ߫߸ ߒߠߋ ߦߴߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߖߊ߬ߛߙߋ߬ߡߟߊ߬ߓߊ߮ ߣߌ߫ ߘߟߊߝߎߟߊ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߞߊ߬ ߝߘߴߊ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: أَلَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّنِي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ وَبَشِيرٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: allā taʿbudū illā al-laha innanī lakum min'hu nadhīrun wabashīrun
translations: and a bearer of glad tidings
